name: Flips: The Adventure Series
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

THE ORIGINAL ADVENTURE SERIES

The thrilling Adventure Series from one of the world's most famous authors!

INTERACTIVE FEATURES

  • Collect jigsaw pieces as you read through each adventure to unlock fun and challenging puzzles!
  • Complete comprehension quizzes to unlock more jigsaw pieces.
  • Touch links in text to pop up character profiles or re-play sound effects
  • Share a chapter with your friends via DS Wireless Communication.

INCLUDES 8 BOOKS TO READ!

  • THE ISLAND OF ADVENTURE
  • THE CASTLE OF ADVENTURE
  • THE VALLEY OF ADVENTURE
  • THE SEA OF ADVENTURE
  • THE MOUNTAIN OF ADVENTURE
  • THE SHIP OF ADVENTURE
  • THE CIRCUS OF ADVENTURE
  • THE RIVER OF ADVENTURE
developedBy: EA Bright Light, Shanghai Mineloader Software Co., Ltd.
